pageContext.claim: “And I'll say this, and I can say it very publicly, that if I win the election, I will have a deal made with Iran within 30 days. They make a very fast deal.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's efforts to dismantle the Iran deal negotiated by Obama have been rejected by European allies and Iran has ramped up its nuclear efforts. Given the poor diplomatic results, Trump keeps claiming Iran is eager to negotiate a new deal but there is no evidence of that.
